articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: PlayStation 5 retail price is going up, Sony announces - Polygon
articles.description: The PS5 is getting more expensive. Sony announced Thursday it’s raising the retail price of the PlayStation 5 in the UK, Europe, Canada, Mexico, Japan, China, and Australia.
articles.content: Nearly two years into the life of the PlayStation 5, Sony is taking the unusual step of raising the price of its current-generation console. Sony Interactive Entertainment president and CEO Jim Ryan … [+2564 chars]
